entry.content:
How It Works:

Step 1: Submit Your Property

Fill out the form on this page and submit your property. I’ll automatically receive your information and begin the review process. I look at county data, recent sales data, and research comparable properties to determine what I can offer you for your property.

Step 2: We make you a cash offer

I will contact you either by phone or email to present and discuss with you my offer amount. Once we have come to an agreement, I’ll prepare a purchase agreement and send it your way.

Step 3: You get paid

Once I receive a signed agreement I will begin the closing process and arrange a closing date with you. Leave all the work to me to close on this property.

Funds will be sent to you by check or wired to your bank account based on your preference!

There is no risk and no obligation and I'll make it as easy for you as I possibly can.  

Start Here To Get Your Cash Offer!


Please submit the following form and I'll get back to you right away.  On the last page, be sure to indicate your preferred method of communication (phone, email or text message).  Or if you prefer telephone you can just call me anytime at 315-556-8899.  You may have to leave a message but I'll get back to you as soon as I can.

 

Frequently Asked Questions

  • I receive offers for my property all the time, why should I choose The Upstate Land Company?

    • I have a unique focus on the upstate NY market and I am dedicated to providing you the best possible seller experience.  

  • Is there a cost for your services?

    • No.  There is no cost to get an offer on your property.  And if we make a deal, I'll cover all the closing costs and fees associated with the sale.

  • I don't want to submit my property through this site, can I call instead?

    • Absolutely.  You can call any time at (315) 556-8899.  You may have to leave a message but I'll get back to you quickly.  

  • What will you do with my property once you buy it?

    • Most properties will be resold.  I may retain a few properties in my long term investment portfolio. 

  • Are you going to give me top dollar for my property?

    • No.  You would probably get a higher price selling it with a realtor.  However, that can be a slow and occasionally frustrating process.  My goal is to provide you with a fast and painless process so you get the cash you need... and stop the expenses associated with owning land you don't need!

About The Upstate Land Company

The Upstate Land Company is owned and managed by me, Stephen Canner.  

As an upstate New York resident, landowner, and land investor, I know a little bit about the unique situation we face here.  New York state regulations and taxes can be burdensome. Real estate sales can be slow. Winters can slow things down even more. When I started this company I wanted to focus on the unique needs of the people who own land here. 

I have always loved land, maps, and the outdoors.  When I was younger I worked in agriculture and construction but my recent career has involved computing technology. I love helping people reach their goals, and I love stretching myself to see what I can accomplish. This business combines those skills and values.

I live in the Adirondack foothills in northern New York with my wife Jo and several pets.  I have never had children of my own, so philanthropy is my "why".  My big goal in life is to be able to donate lots of money to worthy causes.  

I look forward to showing you how you can get cash for your land to help you reach your goals.
